reviews.title: Bog standard Ibis
reviews.text: Nothing exceptional about this hotel - it's an Ibis. A good five minute walk from the centre of town, this Ibis is quite new with a car park behind the hotel. Nothing to dislike here but not much character in a characterful town.

reviews.title: Good Value
reviews.text: I guess this is a typical Ibis although I've never stayed in one before. Breakfast was a good value for the extra 7 euros. The room was modern, clean, had AC (not great), free internet and parking. It is the furthest hotel from the old town...a 12 minute walk in a so-so neighborhood. The bathroom is entirely modular, i.e. fabricated from one piece of plastic, almost resembling a bathroom on a cruise ship. The shower worked well. No tissues were provided in the bathroom or upon request at desk. The hotel bills itself as "green" which makes me wonder why the hallways were so brightly lit. Not a bad choice if you need parking and don't mind a less-than-charming walk to town.

reviews.title: Decent hotel, good location
reviews.text: We stayed here for 4 nights while visiting the Dordogne. Sarlat makes an excellent base - it's a beautiful town within easy striking distance of castles to the south and the vezere valley (cave paintings etc) to the north.

reviews.title: Very convinient
reviews.text: The ibis was a good choice - reasonably priced, a huge room with aircon, TV etc and all brand new. We picked it because of the free parking as some of the more "characterful" hotels in the centre of town didn't seem to have any. It's a short walk into town (less than 10mins). Breakfast in the hotel was 7.50 Euro which struck us as pricey - we just popped down the road for a croisant from the bakery for 80 cents....

reviews.title: Brand new, clean hotel outside Sarlat centre
reviews.text: Stayed 4 nights, a spacious room, good breakfast for 7.5 euro, good price value if you make a reservation through the internet and about 3 weeks is advance.

reviews.title: Great value, some staffing issues
reviews.text: The hotel was not very full so it was really quite. Free internet connection and parking. As stated – about 600 m. from the city center.
